original_query: SELECT MIN(v.Id) FROM votes as v, posts as p, badges as b, users as u WHERE p.Id = v.PostId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND p.Score<=22 AND u.Reputation>=1
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score <= 22
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E3.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation >= 1
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E3.OwnerUserId=E4.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3E4 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E3E4.Id)
